mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SD_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "seStartDate", TO_CHAR(SD_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "sdEndDate", SS_NAME "SSNAME" FROM CALENDARSCHEVIEW WHERE CODE = 'OP_2' AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_1'
SELECT SD_START_DATE "seStartDate", SD_END_DATE "sdEndDate", SS_NAME "SSNAME" FROM CALENDARSCHEVIEW WHERE CODE = 'OP_2' AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_2'
SELECT SD_START_DATE "seStartDate", SD_END_DATE "sdEndDate", SS_NAME "SSNAME" FROM CALENDARSCHEVIEW WHERE CODE = 'OP_2' AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_3'
SELECT SD_START_DATE "seStartDate", SD_END_DATE "sdEndDate", SS_NAME "SSNAME" FROM CALENDARSCHEVIEW WHERE CODE = 'OP_2' AND SD_SS_CODE = 'SS_4'
